title: Fetch.ai, Ocean Protocol, and Singularitynet to Merge Tokens Into ‘Artificial Superintelligence’ Coin
description: The teams from Fetch.ai, Ocean Protocol, and Singularitynet (SNET), three top projects in artificial intelligence (AI) on the blockchain, have announced their intention to amalgamate their tokens into a unified cryptocurrency named “artificial superintelligence (ASI).” 3 Top AI Tokens to Combine Into a Single Coin Called ‘ASI’ In a communication dispatched to Bitcoin.com News, the […]

title: Casa Launches Global Inheritance Solution for Secure Digital Asset Transfer
description: Casa, a leading provider of self-custodial digital asset solutions, is taking a significant step forward by making its innovative inheritance product available to customers worldwide.  This move aims to address what Casa identifies as the most pressing issue in self-custody: ensuring the safe transfer of digital assets, such as bitcoin, ether, and stablecoins USDT and […]

title: XRP Ledger and Version 2.1.1 Update
description: The XRP Ledger community is showing advancements with it’s rollout of version 2.1.1 of rippled, the foundational server software of the ledger. The update marks an important moment in the ledger’s ongoing development. XRP introduces critical bug fix The main thing for the version 2.1.1 update is the introduction of the fixAMMOverflowOffer amendment. The amendment […]
